name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: High-quality wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and long battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals on the go.

name: Smart Watch X1
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, notifications, and a sleek design. Stay connected and monitor your fitness goals.

name: Ultra HD 4K Action Camera
description: Capture your adventures in stunning 4K resolution. Waterproof, shockproof, and ready for any challenge.

name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank with fast charging capabilities. Never run out of battery on your devices again.

name: Gaming Headset Pro
description: Immersive gaming headset with surround sound, noise-cancelling microphone, and RGB lighting.

name: Bluetooth Speaker Waterproof
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with exceptional sound quality and waterproof design for outdoor adventures.

name: Smartphone Gimbal Stabilizer
description: Create professional-looking videos with this 3-axis gimbal stabilizer for smartphones.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek and minimalist design.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Control all your smart home devices from one central hub. Compatible with most popular smart home products.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Responsive mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and programmable keys for the ultimate gaming experience.

name: VR Headset Pro
description: Immersive virtual reality experience with high-resolution displays and precise motion tracking.

name: Drone with 4K Camera
description: Capture stunning aerial footage with this easy-to-fly drone featuring a stabilized 4K camera.
